-----using OpenJson function
SELECT * 
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'nyc_green_taxi_data/raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b'   ,    --0x0b for vertical tab
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
        -- ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
     AS payment_type
     CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc);


---Reading data from the json with array file
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--In this query I read data from json file with an nested array, 
--I opened nested array again using OPENJSON function by specifying the JSON value holder
-- variable name,
--I also renamed the value varible to payment_type_desc_value, 
-- writing new name [datatype] <original_name_path> (for example in this one I did, 
-- payment_type_desc_value NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.value') 
SELECT payment_type, payment_type_desc_value
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'nyc_green_taxi_data/raw/payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b'   ,    --0x0b for vertical tab
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
        -- ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )
     AS payment_type
     CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
     WITH 
     (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
     ) CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
     WITH 
     (
       payment_type_desc_value NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.value'
     )
